title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7033.4 - Transfer of inmate records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7033.4 - Transfer of inmate records

State Regulations
(a) The chief administrative officer of a receiving facility shall request inmate
records necessary and relevant for compliance with Part 7013 of this Title and
sections
500-b
and
601
of the

Correction Law from the chief administrative officer of an information source
facility to the extent such sources are relevant and known to the requesting
facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7033.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
